Rule Description: Detects suspicious SSH / SSHD error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts
Chinese Description: 检测可疑的SSH / SSHD错误消息，这些消息表明可能通过利用尝试引起的致命或可疑错误
Detection: {'keywords': ['unexpected internal error', 'unknown or unsupported key type', 'invalid certificate signing key', 'invalid elliptic curve value', 'incorrect signature', 'error in libcrypto', 'unexpected bytes remain after decoding', 'fatal: buffer_get_string: bad string', 'Local: crc32 compensation attack', 'bad client public DH value', 'Corrupted MAC on input'], 'condition': 'keywords'}
SPL Query: "unexpected internal error" OR "unknown or unsupported key type" OR "invalid certificate signing key" OR "invalid elliptic curve value" OR "incorrect signature" OR "error in libcrypto" OR "unexpected bytes remain after decoding" OR "fatal: buffer_get_string: bad string" OR "Local: crc32 compensation attack" OR "bad client public DH value" OR "Corrupted MAC on input"

Rule Description: Detects exploitation attempt using public exploit code for CVE-2018-15473
Chinese Description: 检测使用CVE-2018-15473的公共利用代码的剥削尝试
Detection: {'keywords': ['error: buffer_get_ret: trying to get more bytes 1907 than in buffer 308 [preauth]'], 'condition': 'keywords'}
SPL Query: "error: buffer_get_ret: trying to get more bytes 1907 than in buffer 308 [preauth]"
